website_summaries.verdict: This durable classic can hold a lot for its size, although some have found its lid-locking mechanism to be lacking.
pros: Can hold up to 18, 12-ounce cans, plus ice
Lid swings open to either side
cons: The pin holding the hood closed can easily spring open, particularly when the cooler is full

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for hubby to use as a lunch box, fits 2 sandwiches, bag of chips, fruit of choice and a snack cake along with 2 drinks, and just enough room to fit ice packs. Everything isn’t squished but nothing is bouncing around.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs better QC
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, just what I was looking for. The only problem is that the factory could have done a better job of knocking down the plastic seams that form between the injection molds. They are sharp and uncomfortable on the handle; I had to take a knife to them to cut them flat.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cullen

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the pumping mom
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is the perfect size to fit 3-4 baby bottles and my pumping parts. I fill this cooler with 2 ice packs and store my breast milk inside at night to avoid going downstairs in the middle of the night after pumping. I also prepare bottles for baby and leave them inside until he is ready to eat. This cooler keeps everything icy cold and fresh until ready to be used, or the morning when I make a trip downstairs to our fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Foreverjaded

customer_reviews.title: Great value purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Have an OLD playmate which STILL keeps things cold. Needed another so ordered this and am pleasantly surprised at the improvements since I bought mine at least 20 years or more ago! It kept my items frozen for the needed 2 hour trip and could tell it would have kept them frozen for more! Glad I chose this cooler! This will be used for the beach also so this is just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: joni s

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality, though with a bit of sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this to a much older one a co-worker owns, these are clearly produced with a lesser quality. They're still good at keeping your food cool and safe but the build quality seems much cheaper. The handle itself wasn't too bad but I still had to take some very fine grit sandpaper to help smooth out some sharp bits not only on the handle but in other areas where you might move your fingers over and accidentally cut yourself. I wish they were built like my coworkers older model, but it'll serve its purpose well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Wish

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Cheap  CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing worse than loving a product from a company and it lasting forever, then ordering the same product years later and find that the company has sunk so low as to sell cheap garbage. Will be returning and moving on to a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B

customer_reviews.title: including a gallon jug of Iced tea which will help keep it cool for him in the summer months
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves this. I got it for him as he is in construction. He uses it as a lunchbox. Although it's big he is able to put everything in it, including a gallon jug of Iced tea which will help keep it cool for him in the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Elena N.

customer_reviews.title: Cooler for short trips
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a cooler exactly like this in the past and do not remember the lid not locking in place. I like to keep a cooler in my car when we go out so that we have cold drinks and snacks when we return to the car for the ride home but the lid does not lock shut, so I am constantly closing it because I find it open. Very irritating. Not the same quality as my previous cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tinoco

customer_reviews.title: Bad item!
customer_reviews.text: Most of the cooler is missing the insulation on the inside it's very flimsy! It it not at all a solid built item.. I expected way more... I mean I atleast expected both sides to be Full of insulation because that's how coolers are supposed to be made. Half of one side dips in and will collapse, I know it wont last! I am fairly upset by this. I dont suggest buying this to anyone.. It shouldnt have passed Q. C. It already had poor reviews and I shouldve listened. :(
customer_reviews.author: CLPV2020

customer_reviews.title: Igloo Playmate Elite 16 Qt
customer_reviews.text: I started using this right away and glad that I bought it too. Now I can take my lunch and drinks with me over the weekend after I have filled it with ice. It is too far to nearest store or fast food chain to get any food or drinks, so I must take what ever I need with me before I leave for the weekend. This is big enough to take two meals and drinks, which is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bird II

customer_reviews.title: Love/hate
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this cooler. I used it everyday for work and bought it because a colleague has the same one. It lasted 7 weeks and now the lid will no longer latch closed.
customer_reviews.author: Rich D

customer_reviews.title: Good for day trips
customer_reviews.text: We always take one of these when we travel, so nice to have cold drinks along the road (no alcohol LOL) That said, the design of the way it opens can be awkward. Also, because the top is NOT insulated, I would not recommend it for anything more than a day trip (ice melts).
customer_reviews.author: Garbo916

customer_reviews.title: Handy, Practical, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one for my husband - after 3 years the lid latch on the first one broke and could not be repaired. He's in construction so things get roughed around. Overall, this is a tough material. This style is easy for him to use when reaching for something while driving. Pleased I could find a replacement because it was the only style he wanted after using it for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Igloo did it right again!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had one of these for 28 years! What a great product! The only thing I didn't like was the lack of a tray. We have as old 1 and it fits inside nicely. The problem is it's disgusting, after using it for 28 years working in construction you can only imagine what it looks like. But that is the tray and not part of this product, I would buy this again if need it in fact we may just buy another 1 to keep his work 1 separate from our beach 1.
customer_reviews.author: PAF

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the name.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use for ice for drinks at work luncheons and pot lucks. Works like a charm and lives up to the name brand. Snaps shut and stays secure. With ice I am still able to tote it around and isnt too heavy where I cannot carry it. Keeps ice cold and from melting for the duration of a work day.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Boone

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Outside was scratched, and ribs inside lid scratched against base when opening. No visible damage to packing - have to assume that it came out of inventory that way. In addition, risers from interior insulation were not properly removed. Poor quality all round. Not worth the trouble of returning, but this will be my last purchase of an Igloo product
customer_reviews.author: GibyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it's a great size, it will be good for the passenger seat when I'm taking trips. It will hold my ice and soda and snacks and still I'll have room on the seat for other things. I have one just like this but a little larger but really it was bigger than I needed and took up too much of the front seat. This way this 7 quart can go on the front seat for easy access while driving, but if I need more space, I can put the larger one in the back seat for access at gas stops.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: This small cooler has held up great for me and still looks like new
customer_reviews.text: This small cooler has held up great for me and still looks like new. The cooler does a nice job of keeping items (food and drink) cold even when outside on a hot day. The only thing I noticed is it's a weird fit for bottles but it fits any cans well. The button on the top by the handle is nice vs. how they used to be made with the button on the side, you can easily open these with just one hand.
customer_reviews.author: JSP85

customer_reviews.title: took fresh frozen seafood (live in Florida) and used the ...
customer_reviews.text: took fresh frozen seafood (live in Florida) and used the Igloo when I traveled by air for a visit home (carried on board). It was a two and a half hour flight and all the items stay frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Morning

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought, but a good size.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd matched measurements with an older one we currently have, but evidently not. This one is several inches smaller, but it's still a good size for drinks or small items being transported from the grocery store. It also doesn't seem as sturdily made as our older one, but (sadly), that's what we've come to expect these days. All-in-all, for someone wanting a cooler this size, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: The push button on top is a poor design as I would keep hitting the button bu ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler lasted barely lasted 4 years. The push button on top is a poor design as I would keep hitting the button bu mistake and it would open. I guess it would be OK if you had smaller hands. The top on this cooler will not lock now and is not usable. the last playmate cooler I had I got in 1978 and it had the button on the side, that lasted until 2014 when it finally broke and I had to buy this one. I don't see me buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Wageman

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is VERY durable, my boyfriend picks it up with the excavator for fun and its held up. We love the colors, but it doesn't hold ice very well. We lost power so I used it to keep drinks cold and the ice melted so fast it was almost pointless. He still uses it to bring lunch to work and it seems fine, but I wouldn't use it for anything serious.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Came with some scratches, but that said she still made CLEAR ICE perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I boiled water briefly, added it to the cooler, and set it in the freezer; about 35-40hrs later I pulled it out, let it sit for maybe 15mins, and out came a beautiful clear slab of ice I was able to scar with a bread knife and then cut by banging the back of the knife with a rubber mallet. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baty

customer_reviews.title: American Made and Absolute Quality
customer_reviews.text: Someone stole my almost thirty year old Igloo lunch tote so bought a new one. This new one is a bit bigger than my original but, it's great. I love the quality and the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a father day for my husband.. it was his fathers starter pack 😜. He loves it. Uses it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kvenild

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality...extremely poor!
customer_reviews.text: I agree 100% with a posted review below! "There is nothing worse than loving a product from a company and it lasting forever, then ordering the same product years later and find that the company has sunk so low as to sell cheap garbage. Will be returning and moving on to a new brand."
customer_reviews.author: steve archer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold ice for very long
customer_reviews.text: It was a thin lunchbox back in the day but it does not hold cold at all when it is way too thin in their redesign not sure what they did but they need to redo it again it won’t hold ice It wont stay cool for very long I’m probably going to just send it back
customer_reviews.author: Michael A  (Mike) Stark

customer_reviews.title: Very good replacement for old igloo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my husband’s igloo playmate lunchbox he had for nearly 30 years. These really last and I’m really happy to find a quality replacement for him.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fosnick

customer_reviews.title: Packs alot
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler so far...had it for about a month. Packs alot of food for the day and extra stuff if needed. Keeps food and drinks cold for 12 hrs. I am sure it would keep longer but havnt had a chance to see. The price is the best on amazon..other places wanted triple the price. Happy with purchase would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: At the steel mill I work at, this is a must for a lunch box. Great quality and MANY of my co-workers have them and have for years. They really hold up over time and do a great job!
customer_reviews.author: User12181

customer_reviews.title: great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what people are complaining about?!? this is exactly what I expected, works very well. my husband is a wood framer and uses it 6 days a week and has not had a problem, had his last one fore nearly 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this exact cooler for over 20 years, as a lunch box for work. I have bought 3 in the last few years because the latch on them breaks and they will either not close or become impossible to open - I do not know what has changed, but a $25 cooler should last longer than 6 months. I will be contacting Igloo with my concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T.

customer_reviews.title: The cooler is smaller than the cooler shown in one ...
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is smaller than the cooler shown in one of the photos in the product listing. See attached photo of cooler containing several cans of soda.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty, don’t know why anyone would spend a ton of money on the exact same type of cooler. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Good size allows for a days worth (and more) of food. It got left in the bed of a pickup during a rainstorm and the inside stayed dry. This might not matter, but in case anyone was wondering!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Buhner

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap feelings. The lid feels like it will just fall right off. Seal is extremely poor. Huge gap, between lid and cooler body. NOTHING like the old ones. Save your money on this. I read the bad reviews and still took a chance. I never leave reviews either, but I'm very disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Fred brown

customer_reviews.title: does not cool
customer_reviews.text: this thing is horrible at keeping items cool And the close and open feature is. I do nor recommend. Does not live up to product description. waited too long and could not return.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Igloo playmate elite
customer_reviews.text: The igloo playmate is a great size for the individual on the go that doesn't want to over bring cold items with them but just enough to hold them through out the day. Great sturdy hand-held cooler that last a very long time. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Day Trip
customer_reviews.text: I pack this cooler every work day with 4-5 waters and ice year round. Fits well on the floor just behind my drivers' seat and is easy to open and close as needed with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. I had one of these coolers for ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I had one of these coolers for years but it went to my ex. I loved it for camping and road trips. This cooler that came in the mail is nothing a distant shadow to the way they used to be made. This thing is thin and flimsy, especially the white plastic top, which is bendable plastic - and the top does not slide open easily - you have to really jam it. Very disappointed in the degradation of what was once a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MariaG

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Playmate. The first one lasted probably 15 years with daily use. For medical reasons I need to keep it in my bedroom for water and some food, so this is the perfect size and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Sister

customer_reviews.title: Great value and ice lasted much longer than YETI soft side
customer_reviews.text: This is just like any other Playmate-that is well made and functional. Holds 2-3 bottles of water and a couple of sandwiches and the ice pack lasts more than 12 hours. Yeti softside that was 8x as much money lasted less than 5 hours. I tested them both. Very happy with this product and like that they moved the opening to the top (from the side).
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: oldie but goodie
customer_reviews.text: Great little personal cooler - used for kids camp lunches/snacks - 90 degree plus days at camp no a/c and their was still ice/ice water left after 8 hours. Only issue is if you knock it over when it has the ice water..it will leak all over - so just need to be extra careful. But otherwise great little cooler...holds approx 6 pack soda cans. Holds about 3 bottles of water plus sandwich, snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Regina R

customer_reviews.title: Great size and well insulated.
customer_reviews.text: had one of these some years ago. So glad I found this. Perfect size for a few drinks and lunch for 2 of us, especially when going to the beach. Well insulated. Plenty of room Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: CarolZN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lunch
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a lunch box for work. It has plenty of room for a lunch plus snacks. Plus the cooler is tall enough that a 20oz bottle fits into the cooler. Using an ice pack or 2 the contents stay nice and cool
customer_reviews.author: DJ Green

customer_reviews.title: This color cooler seem to be all defective look at picture .
customer_reviews.text: I ordered twice same cooler and both defective , bumped out and discolored , now again will have to go to ups on my lunch to return, very disappointed, seem to all be defective in this color .
customer_reviews.author: Sue Beddia

customer_reviews.title: Good size and great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes this to work every day with his lunch and snacks in it. This is his third one he's had over the course of nearly 20 years. Good size and great value.
customer_reviews.author: akitagal

customer_reviews.title: ... make my time away from home a little less painful. My food stays cold and stuff
customer_reviews.text: It holds 36 hours' worth of food and enough Irish whiskey to make my time away from home a little less painful. My food stays cold and stuff. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: groundhog

customer_reviews.title: Broke at 5mo
customer_reviews.text: All is great except the box broke last month. The handle no longer closes so it swings open and closed. I bought this for my husband who isn’t rough on his items. Disappointed it didn’t even last 6mo for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, really durable, and keeps stuff cold
customer_reviews.text: It's an Igloo, so the usual great quality and durability one would expect. Keeps things nice and cold, and this is a handy size. My last Igloo Playmate like this lasted for 40 years, and was still in perfect condition when it disappeared into the Bermuda Triangle.
customer_reviews.author: Argonaut

customer_reviews.title: Good for snacks and a few drinks
customer_reviews.text: If your just looking to take a few snacks and pops with you thus is great but if you are really wanting to use it for a good hardy lunch and drinks for a long work day you may want to find a size larger. Very sturdy and does a good job keeping items cold!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reece

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look as sturdy as my old one. The plastic seems to be much thinner than the smaller one I had for years.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift for my son to use on his camping and skateboarding adventures. It is a replacement for the one he has that is old and falling apart and needed duct tape to be used. The old one lasted about 10 years. I was concerned about the several reviews that say that the product opens by itself without a person doing so, but it looks the same as his previous red igloo playmate elite, so I ordered it anyway. So far, no reported problems. Igloo's provide adequate insulation for cold items, with ice, as per my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Louise S S

customer_reviews.title: It arrived with grease stains on it.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived dirty, with what looked like black grease marks and it looked pretty beat up. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TheBanshee

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always bought these coolers for my husband and the last one he had lasted him 7 years and we decided to get a new one because it was old looking but it wasn’t broken just dirty because of its years. Very good brand for working men!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for My Bride and I to use at work (yes we work together) We work 12 hour shifts and needed something big enough to hold our lunches and snacks for our shifts. Very sturdy, and dependable. What you would expect from Igloo!
customer_reviews.author: MoonManTom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome “portable fridge”
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for work since their old fridge there died and no one wanted to chip in for a new one so he went with plan B to keep his perishable lunch items cold. He says it’s an awesome “portable fridge” 😉
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan71

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooler!
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a trip to the headwaters of the Mississippi River and it worked perfectly! Kept our water cold and lightweight to carry into the hotel at night!
customer_reviews.author: J M W

customer_reviews.title: Nice big lunch box
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it it is not padded in the top but it was just what he was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Lena Faye Marler

customer_reviews.title: Playmates are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Ver impressed with the new push "button" on the handle. Much easier than the one on the side. My last Playmate lasted about 30 years, so I'm counting on durability being good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Six pack rack
customer_reviews.text: This will not fit in the Six Pack Rack of say a Banshee or a Honda four trax. The bubble on the sides will NOT let it sit down deep enough. I had to bend the Six Pack Rack to make it fit
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cooler
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have not used it yet but it was what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: LovesGadgets

customer_reviews.title: Worth having and replacing
customer_reviews.text: We've had Igloo coolers for years had to have another since son borrowed ours and kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It was a replacement
customer_reviews.text: It was a replacement from one just like it. I've had em for years. They travel many mile with my on hunting and pipeline work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. The button that opens the cooler kept sticking. Felt like the cooler wouldn't last very long. Returned the product
customer_reviews.author: Graceann

customer_reviews.title: So glad that I could find an igloo cooler for the ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I could find an igloo cooler for the price, only thing is that it must have gotten some damage to it during shipping, the handle has a rough spot that is black, like it scraped against something
customer_reviews.author: Jaysun Trueheeyo

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great - My husband has been using his old cooler like this for over 20 years and he used it on a daily bases to pack his lunch - I finally had to replace his old one - but this is just like it and expect it to last just as long!!! Very happy with this cooler
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Steele

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: It was the right size that was needed, keep the food at the right temperature and used it for a lunch bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size cooler and does a good job of keeping food and drinks cool. It is slightly awkward to carry but less awkward than most coolers of that size. It opens easily with a lock on the side of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small cooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beach! I've had an earlier model of one of these and put it to regular use for many years. It has done its job faithfully all the while. Bought this one for my BF who loved my lil Playmate and wanted one of his own.
customer_reviews.author: Professoriat

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with deep top end surface scratches
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with scratches all over the top half, just like the reviews told me. I guess I shouldn’t be upset, I was warned with comment reviews. Arrived scratched on May 13, 2020
customer_reviews.author: Sura Procter

customer_reviews.title: Good lunch cooler
customer_reviews.text: Call me old fashion but only reason for 4 stars is it's to easy to hit the top button when walking to have it open up on you, I prefer the button in the sides
customer_reviews.author: TeslaCoil

customer_reviews.title: Lid on backwards
customer_reviews.text: So I received my cooler 1 day late ( typical lately of UPS ) Love the size and Playmate construction, only problem, they assembled it with the lid on backwards! However, easy fix, I carefully with a thin knife and finger nails, lifted the round, white , plastic caps on each side ( from the bottom ) off, removed the phillips screws and reinstalled lid with button on same side as notch on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cant go wrong with a time tested easy portable cooler
customer_reviews.text: i drive a semi ..easy to empty and clean does the trick
customer_reviews.author: Scott rope

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Not too big, not too small. Using on our boat for extra ice.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth S.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use this cooler 5 to 6 times a week for my lunch at work. I’ve had it for a few weeks now and I’m still loving it. I put ice in at the beginning of the day and 12 hours later there’s still ice. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great little cooler! I bought it so I could save on ice. You can keep 9 12 oz cans ice cold with a couple hands full of ice! Would be a great travel companion as well for cold cuts and bottled water!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend igloo is sturdy it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: We bought this, having borrowed our daughter's previously, so we knew what we were getting. We like the swing open lid.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: Good price,last long
customer_reviews.text: My igloo playmate just broke. I went to go buy another and I realized I have had this cooler for over 2 years,which is amazing to me ,because I use it 5 days a week and I'm VERY hard on it...
customer_reviews.author: derek hall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would recommend these if you like your lunches and drinks to stay cool for a long time. Grew up on these bad boys and it was never a disappointment. Buy one of these, and you’ll be satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Shaye

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: I live my igloo and have used it for all occasions from beach to camping. I grew up with igloo’s and the quality appears to be same.
customer_reviews.author: JohnNJ

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my beer cold!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat this cooler. Just buy it and save $375. From the other guy
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a little bit bigger but still useable .
customer_reviews.author: Bug bee 239

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for his lunch, drinks and important stuff for work. It is nice looking, sturdy and keeps his stuff cold and safe. He’s only been using it since January, but so far so good. He’s definitely not gentle on it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Shearon

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage Capacity, Easy to Carr  Clean
customer_reviews.text: Cooler is nearly identical to the same model we had many years ago. The only thing is that the lid does not slide as smoothly as the older item.
customer_reviews.author: NKQ

customer_reviews.title: The quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Igloo is always been a quality product. This is no different. I got it for my daughter so she could take her lunch to work. She likes it and it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift; however, I carried one of these for 25 years as a lunch box. Very tough. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pofinmt

customer_reviews.title: Tools required upon unpacking: Phillips head screwdriver along with a small flathead screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great cooler once you fix it! After spending a quick half hour repairing the locking mechanism, we will be able to use it for packing meals for multiple families!! We'll even unplug our fridge and throw ice packs in it to keep our food cool at the house all the time! I would give this product a 5 out of 5 if it was able to be opened out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother cheaply made and not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This item was not made well. Perhaps kine was defective but the handle broke the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like. I purchased a 7 quart playmate in 1990 ...
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like. I purchased a 7 quart playmate in 1990 and still use it today! This one is for my lovely wife.
customer_reviews.author: Frizzer88

customer_reviews.title: Broken from day 1!
customer_reviews.text: Igloo does not close/lock. Had problem from day one but I kept forgetting to return. Now I am stuck with igloo that does not close/lock!!! Worthless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy cooler for my husband. It gets kind of rough use but so far is holding up well. The only complaint is that it kind of scrapes or rubs when you open or close it. Otherwise A-ok.
customer_reviews.author: Esther H.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about two years.
customer_reviews.text: This one lasted just about two years. Then the lid latch mechanism broke. The first one I purchased locally died with the same problem. I like the cooler until it breaks. I am purchasing a third Igloo today, but will continue my search for a similar size cooler that is constructed more solidly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Schimpf

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for beverages and ice!
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my work lunchbox. Very durable for rugged conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Lynn Mueller

customer_reviews.title: On the go
customer_reviews.text: Cooler doesn’t have the push butto on dude as years before so easier to open n close
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: very poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived totally scuffed up and dirty. It was not wrapped. There was a very small thin sheet of paper on top. But, the cooler was about 3" smaller than the box so it totally moved around and got black scuffs all over it that I can't get out. This is a gift and it is quite embarrassing! It may end up being returned!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid little cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a good adult lunch cooler, or good for a 6pk. It's not the lightest, but it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: BIRDY

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever.
customer_reviews.text: Ours after 20 years finally gave up, needed new one
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Light weight!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect cooler for every day work! My dad has had these coolers for years and it is the only one he will use for work every day.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hamed
